radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver is homogeneous in echotexture and has a smooth contour. There is no focal liver lesion. There is no intrahepatic biliary dilation. The CBD measures 4 mm. Main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow. The gallbladder is not distended. A 1.5 cm shadowing gallstone is present at the fundus. There is mild gallbladder wall thickening without definitive evidence of wall edema. No pericholecystic fluid. Pancreas is obscured. There is no ascites.
